Sentencas: Due to the high carbon dioxide emissions added to the atmosphere from the transportation sector, it is imperative to replace current transportation powering systems with more environmentally-benign alternatives.
Titulo: Comparative evaluation of fuel cell based powering systems for cleaner locomotives

Sentencas: This paper provides a comparative study of recently proposed fuel cell-based powering systems for cleaner locomotives.
Titulo: Comparative evaluation of fuel cell based powering systems for cleaner locomotives

Sentencas: This comparison involves four factors, namely thermodynamic energy and exergy efficiencies, CO2 emissions, and fuel costs per a duty cycle.
Titulo: Comparative evaluation of fuel cell based powering systems for cleaner locomotives

Sentencas: The results of this comparative assessment study show that using a hybrid solid-oxide fuel cell-gas turbine powering system fueled by natural gas is the better option in terms of thermodynamic efficiencies and fuel costs, but not carbon emissions since hydrogen and ammonia-fueled systems have no emissions during operation.
Titulo: Comparative evaluation of fuel cell based powering systems for cleaner locomotives

Sentencas: This system has energy efficiency and exergy efficiency values of 67.8% and 61.7%, respectively.
Titulo: Comparative evaluation of fuel cell based powering systems for cleaner locomotives

Sentencas: A hydrogen-based powering system is not currently feasible since it costs about 5.9 times more than what the current diesel engine powering systems cost for operation.
Titulo: Comparative evaluation of fuel cell based powering systems for cleaner locomotives

Sentencas: It can only be economically feasible if the hydrogen fuel cost drops below C$3 per kg of hydrogen which will take many years to accomplish.
Titulo: Comparative evaluation of fuel cell based powering systems for cleaner locomotives

Sentencas: Although the energy efficiency of a hydrogen fuel cell is thermodynamically reasonable to make the performance assessment, there is a strong need to additionally focus on economic dimensions of the systems.
Titulo: Comparative evaluation of fuel cell based powering systems for cleaner locomotives

Sentencas: Therefore, transitional fuels, such as natural gas and ammonia, are needed to attract the locomotive industry to more environmentally benign powering systems.
Titulo: Comparative evaluation of fuel cell based powering systems for cleaner locomotives
